data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: Only Google Chrome, Safari and the In-App browser are shown there.
data.expected_result: All installed browsers should be shown.
data.short_description: Certain web browsers not shown in the user settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Install any other browser than Chrome and Safari (for example Firefox) from the App Store - Go back to Discord and open your user settings - Go to "Web browser" - Observe the browsers listed there
